title: Logh- Every time a bell rings an angel gets his wings
description:
Every Time a Bell Rings an Angel Gets His Wings is the first album by Swedish post rock band Logh. It was released in Sweden on January 21, 2002 and in the rest of Europe on July 23, 2002.
